{"step_by_step_thinking": "Tocilizumab, also known as Actemra, is a medication used in the treatment of several autoimmune diseases. It works by blocking the action of interleukin-6 (IL-6), a substance in the body that causes inflammation. Therefore, it can be said that Tocilizumab is used to block or antagonize the IL-6 receptor.", "answer_choice": "A"}
